paragraph: Adam MacDougall (born August 1974 in New York City, New York), is the keyboardist who replaced Rob Clores in The Black Crowes in time to record Warpaint in July 2007.  Previously, he was a member of The Ben Taylor Band and Furslide, and he has also toured with Macy Gray and Patti Rothberg.

Circles Around The Sun, Fare Thee Well Setbreak music, 2015Source:
